testimonials.title: Trusted by Industry Professionals
testimonials.subtitle: See what leading photographers and creative professionals are saying about PhotoMaker

items.name: Emily Chen
items.quote: PhotoMaker has revolutionized our studio workflow. The AI-powered transformations are incredibly natural and save us hours of post-processing time.

items.name: Michael Rodriguez
items.quote: The versatility of styles and the precision of the results are outstanding. We've integrated PhotoMaker into our production pipeline.

items.name: Sarah Thompson
items.quote: The attention to detail in preserving facial features while applying creative transformations is remarkable. It's become an essential tool.

items.question: How many photos can I transform at once?
items.answer: You can upload and transform up to 4 photos simultaneously in a single batch.

items.question: What file formats are supported?
items.answer: We support common image formats including JPG, PNG, and WebP.

items.question: How long does the generation process take?
items.answer: Most transformations complete within 10-30 seconds, depending on the complexity.

items.question: Can I use custom prompts?
items.answer: Yes, you can provide custom text prompts to guide the AI transformation process.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Photos?
cta.description: Start creating stunning AI-generated photos today
